languages.text: "Конечно, справитесь". {n}Кунрад нашаривает что-то в кармане.{/n} "Леди Теодора не стала бы терпеть в рядах своих наследников кого-то, на кого она не могла бы положиться... но это уже неважно."

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, справитесь". {n}Кунрад нашаривает что-то в кармане.{/n} "Леди Теодора не стала бы терпеть в рядах своих наследников кого-то, на кого она не могла бы положиться... но это уже неважно."

languages.text: "Of course you will." {n}He rummages in his pocket for something.{/n} "Lady Theodora would never have someone she couldn't rely on as one of her heirs... but that is no longer relevant."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, справитесь". {n}Кунрад нашаривает что-то в кармане.{/n} "Леди Теодора не стала бы терпеть в рядах своих наследников кого-то, на кого она не могла бы положиться... но это уже неважно."

"Of course you will." {n}He rummages in his pocket for something.{/n} "Lady Theodora would never have someone she couldn't rely on as one of her heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

languages.text: “遵命。”{n}他在口袋里翻找着什么。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人绝不会让她不信任的人成为候选继承人……不过，这件事情已经不重要了。”
languages.original_text: "Of course you will." {n}He rummages in his pocket for something.{/n} "Lady Theodora would never have someone she couldn't rely on as one of her heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: “遵命。”{n}他在口袋里翻找着什么。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人绝不会让她不信任的人成为候选继承人……不过，这件事情已经不重要了。”

languages.text: «Claro que sí». {n}Rebusca algo en su bolsillo.{/n} «Lady Theodora nunca elegiría a alguien en quien no pudiera confiar como hereder{mf|o|a}... aunque eso ya no importa».
languages.original_text: "Of course you will." {n}He rummages in his pocket for something.{/n} "Lady Theodora would never have someone she couldn't rely on as one of her heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: «Claro que sí». {n}Rebusca algo en su bolsillo.{/n} «Lady Theodora nunca elegiría a alguien en quien no pudiera confiar como hereder{mf|o|a}... aunque eso ya no importa».

languages.text: 「あなたはもちろん、そうするでしょう」{n}彼は何かを探してポケットをあさる。{/n}「シオドーラ様にとって、信頼できない人物を後継者に迎えることはありません…しかし、それはもう関係ないのです」
languages.original_text: "Of course you will." {n}He rummages in his pocket for something.{/n} "Lady Theodora would never have someone she couldn't rely on as one of her heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんそうしますよ{n}」彼は何かを探してポケットをあさる。{/n}レディ・「テオドラにとって、信頼できない人物を後継者に迎えることはありません…しかし、それはもう関係ありません」
「あなたはもちろん、そうするでしょう」{n}彼は何かを探してポケットをあさる。{/n}「シオドーラ様にとって、信頼できない人物を後継者に迎えることはありません…しかし、それはもう関係ないのです」

languages.text: « Je n'en doute pas un seul instant, {n}dit-il en fouillant dans ses poches.{/n} Dame Théodora n'aurait jamais choisi pour {mf|héritier|héritière} quelqu'un qu'elle n'estime pas digne de confiance... mais cela n'a plus aucune importance. »
languages.original_text: "Of course you will." {n}He rummages in his pocket for something.{/n} "Lady Theodora would never have someone she couldn't rely on as one of her heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en doute pas un seul instant, {n}dit-il en fouillant dans ses poches.{/n} Dame Théodora n'aurait jamais choisi pour {mf|héritier|héritière} quelqu'un qu'elle n'estime pas digne de confiance... mais cela n'a plus aucune importance. »

languages.text: "Aber natürlich." {n}Er kramt in seiner Tasche nach etwas.{/n} "Lady Theodora würde niemanden zum Erben bestimmen, auf den sie sich nicht verlassen kann ... aber das spielt jetzt keine Rolle mehr."
languages.original_text: "Of course you will." {n}He rummages in his pocket for something.{/n} "Lady Theodora would never have someone she couldn't rely on as one of her heirs... but that is no longer relevant."

traits.locale_text: "Aber natürlich." {n}Er kramt in seiner Tasche nach etwas.{/n} "Lady Theodora würde niemanden zum Erben bestimmen, auf den sie sich nicht verlassen kann ... aber das spielt jetzt keine Rolle mehr."

languages.text: "Ona ne şüphe." {n}Elini cebine sokup bir şeyler arıyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora, güvenemeyeceği birisini asla vârisleri arasına almaz... Lakin bunun artık bir ehemmiyeti yok."
languages.original_text: "Of course you will." {n}He rummages in his pocket for something.{/n} "Lady Theodora would never have someone she couldn't rely on as one of her heirs... but that is no longer relevant."
